TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Here is the story:

His eyes were cursed by someone somehow. When it happened is unknown, but the effects stayed hidden until now. He was sitting on a park bench next to the only friend he had; the girl from his bus and 3rd period class. They shared almost all their knowledge with each other for hours on end until they had to go home and prepare for the next day.

But the boy never told her about his eyes. He had never mentioned that they change color only very slightly most of the time. Unknown to even himself these changes happen just before mood swings or the sense of paradise. He never planned to mention his oddity as it would move him towards the "freak" side and away from the "average" side of the popularity line.

The girl asked him if he would-...RED...-Surrender his life so she could spill his blood all-...BLUE...- so that they could watch a movie together. The boy tilted his head in confusion and shock. He asked for her to repeat herself, something must be wrong. She giggled and said "don't be nervous! I only want-...RED...-to rip out your pathetic heart and burn it on a stake!". The ground ignited and trees died. the boy jumped back and fell onto his back-...BLUE...-The girl rushed over to him, following his gaze. "what's wrong!? are you okay? what did you see?". The boy then stared at her with his fear encompassed eyes, too terrified to speak.-...RED...-When the girl backhanded him and spewed forth insults and horrific threats-...BLUE...-The girl screamed in surprise as her friend writhed in pain. She tried to help but the boy would get worse and scream for her to get away.

...RED...

...BLUE...

...RED...

...BLUE...

...GREY...

As the ambulance and police arrived at the scene where the terrified girl stood watching in horror, the boy convulsed and jerked about. He had a seizure of insanity and rolled around drooling. Several months later the girl would watch him with tear filled eyes and sob into his chest as he lied in a coma, In his hospital bed.

Ok....

Are you feeling ok Rage?

Ok....

Are you feeling ok Rage?

I'm fine. I just wanted to tell a story about a boy who began to live in two different worlds, seemingly Heaven and Hell.

This doesn't relate to me whatsoever.
